meanings.definition: The introductory or main page of a website.
meanings.sent1: I always check the homepage of the website for the latest updates.
meanings.sent2: When you type the website address, the homepage is the first page you see.
meanings.sent3: The homepage of the website greeted me like a friendly welcome mat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the homepage of the party, drawing everyone in.
meanings.sent5: The homepage of the website was like a colorful doorway to a world of information.

meanings.definition: The first page that appears when a web browser is opened.
meanings.sent1: My homepage is set to a news website so I can catch up on current events.
meanings.sent2: Every time I open my browser, the homepage shows me the weather forecast.
meanings.sent3: The homepage of my browser popped up like a surprise gift.
meanings.sent4: His laughter echoed through the room, filling it like a homepage.
meanings.sent5: The homepage of my browser was a window to the digital world waiting to be explored.
